meanings.definition: A substance that neutralizes stomach acid to relieve indigestion or heartburn.
meanings.sent1: I took some antacids after eating spicy food to help with my heartburn.
meanings.sent2: Many people keep antacids in their medicine cabinet for indigestion.
meanings.sent3: The antacids danced in my stomach, calming the fiery acid down.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was like antacids for his soul, soothing his worries.
meanings.sent5: The antacids worked like magic, making the discomfort disappear instantly.

meanings.definition: Medications used to treat symptoms of acid reflux and stomach ulcers.
meanings.sent1: My doctor recommended antacids to help with my acid reflux.
meanings.sent2: Antacids are commonly used to alleviate the pain of stomach ulcers.
meanings.sent3: The antacids whispered promises of relief to my troubled stomach.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness acted as antacids for his emotional wounds, healing him gently.
meanings.sent5: The antacids were like knights in shining armor, battling the acid dragons in my belly.
